Class GamePlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • GamePlayer
  • public class GamePlayer
extends java.lang.Object
    Class GamePlayer - The player of the game This class is part of the "A stereotypical maze adventure" application. The player is who plays the game, the player has its own properties, has its own inventory for storing items, and the player is able to walk around different rooms by inputing commands, pick up and drop items desired, consume items to increase HP, and equip weapon to fight different characters, including the final boss.
    Version:
    2021.12.03
    Author:
    Chin Wan k21016106

    • Constructor Detail

      • GamePlayer

        public GamePlayer()
        Create the player with the player's properties and weight limit. At the beginning there is no weapon equipped and the inventory is empty.

      • pickupPlayerItem

        public void pickupPlayerItem​(java.lang.String name,
                             java.lang.String description,
                             int weight,
                             java.lang.String type,
                             int increasedHP,
                             int damageCaused)
        Pick up the item from the current room the player is in, or from the opponent the player defeated, or from the riddler. Add the item picked up to the inventory.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the item picked up
        description - Description of the item picked up
        weight - Weight of the item picked up
        type - Type of the item picked up
        increasedHP - The amount of HP that the item picked up can increase for the player
        damageCaused - The damage caused by the item picked up use during a fight

      • dropPlayerItem

        public Item dropPlayerItem​(java.lang.String name)
        Remove the item desired from the inventory
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the item desired to be removed
        Returns:
        Return the item that is removed, or null if not found
